slide.title: What is SOAP Good for?
slide.blurb: SOAP will take the world by storm and change everything, SOAP will be used everywhere, everyone will talk to everyone, and we'll all live happily ever after.
Shh...I've got a bridge in Brooklyn...any takers?
But really, there are some good things about SOAP.

list.bullet: Exchanging information between two dissimilar systems
Occasional events, such as single sign-on
